newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela H1 tax collections 21 pct above target.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela H1 tax collections 21 pct above target.

text.p: Venezuelan tax collections reached 1.950 trillion bolivars ($3.9 billion) in the first half of the year, or 21 percent more than targeted, the National Tax Superintendency (SENIAT) said Tuesday.
The government had based its 1997 budget on first-half tax revenues of 1.608 trillion bolivars, SENIAT said in a release.
Ordinary tax revenues contribute slightly more than half of total government income, with the rest coming from taxation on oil activities.
